Charllote has been a borrower with ID-Ghana and is on her ninth loan cycle. She has repaid all of her previous loans successfully, which she used to improve her food business by replenishing her supply of pork, beef, cooking oil, rice and beans. She received profits which she used to cover part of her household expenses and school fees. 

Charllote is now requesting her ninth loan which she will use to buy pork, beef, cooking oil, rice and beans to sell to customers. In the coming years, she would like to grow her portfolio. 

Charllote will share this loan with her group members. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: To buy pork, beef, cooking oil, rice and beans to sell to customers.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura está estudiando para ser una abogada exitosa y con mucho esfuerzo esta estudiando para poder lograrlo, su meta es poder ayudar a las personas que necesitan.
Es de la ciudad de Pilar, ella se destaca por su entusiasmo y ganas de salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa manera poder cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en:
Laura is studying to be a successful lawyer and with much effort is studying to get ahead.  Her goal is to help people in need.

She lives in the city of Pilar.  She is known for her enthusiasm and desire to succeed.

She is requesting this loan to pay the fees for her courses, and thus able to cover the expenses that she has.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca es de la ciudad de Villarrica, se está esforzando por poder cumplir su meta de ser un profesional exitoso.
Ella está estudiando la carrera de Radiología, y por medio de esa carrera quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas a salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder sentirse útil ayudando a las demás personas.
texts.en:
Blanca is from the city of Villarrica. She is striving to be able to accomplish her goal of being a successful professional.

She is studying in the program in radiology, and through this career she wants to be able to help other people to move forward.

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay her program fees and in this way be able to feel useful helping other people.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Sirvard

texts.en:
Sirvard lives in Vosketap village in the Ararat region. She lives there with her son and daughter. 

Sirvard has been running her family farm for 10 years. She is involved in aviculture, and in cultivation of corn. The requested loan of USD 3,000 is very important for Sirvard to purchase 2 oxen, fertilizer, forage for feeding the livestock and hire workers for land cultivation. Sirvard hopes for lenders' support, as income from farming activities is highly important in sustaining her family.

As this is Sirvard's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn't have access to credit products before, because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for 2 oxen, fertilizer, forage for feeding the livestock and hire workers for land cultivation

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria comenta que su meta es ser una buena profesional por eso con empeño y dedicación sigue sus estudios pensando en sus hijos, a pesar de trabajar se hace de tiempo para poder estudiar.
Su objetivo es llegar a culminar su carrera y ser útil a su comunidad. Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir el pago de sus cuotas, de manera a estar cada vez más cerca de su meta.
texts.en:
Maria says her goal is to be a good professional.  With commitment and dedication, she continues her studies, thinking about her children.

In addition to working, she makes time to study.

Her goal is to finish her studies and serve her community. She is requesting this loan to cover the payment of her tuition, and so to be closer to her goal.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
Arturo es funcionario de una Cooperativa ya hace varios años y su objetivo es culminar su carrera con éxito y en un futuro no muy lejano llegar a ser un empresario exitoso de manera a mejorar sus ingresos y la de su familia.
Él está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, y por medio de este quiere poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de universidad, de manera a poder estar mas cerca de cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Arturo has already been an employee of a cooperative for a number of years, and his goal is to complete his program with success and in the not-too-distant future to become a successful business owner in such a way that he can improve his income and that of his family.

He is studying in the accounting program, and through this he wants to be able to help his loved ones.

He is requesting this loan to be able to invest in the payment of his university fees, so that in this way he can be closer to accomplishing his dreams.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia es una mujer muy luchadora, que se está esforzando para poder dar a sus seres queridos una vida sin privaciones.
Ella está estudiando la carrera de derecho, y por medio de su carrera quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas que necesiten atención y ayuda en cuestiones legales.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar su matrícula y cubrir gastos de estudios que tiene. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Claudia is a very hard-working woman who is striving to be able to give her loved ones a life without privation.

She is studying in the law program, and through this career she wants to be able to help other people who need attention and help with legal questions.

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay her registration fees and cover the educational expenses that she has. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to grow and advance.

loans.use: to pay registration fees and other educational expenses.

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
Lusine lives in Arshaluys village in the Armavir region with her husband and two children (aged 14 and 13 years old). 

For the last few years Lusine has been running a farm. She cultivates plants in the greenhouse (cucumber and eggplant). Both Lusine and her husband are unemployed and their only source of income is farming. They work hard to have a successful and profitable farm. Lusine requested a loan for $3,000, which she will use to purchase pumps and polyethylene covers for the greenhouse. 

Lusine relies on lenders' goodwill and support to her loan.

loans.use: to pay for pumps and polyethylene covers for the greenhouse

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for groceries

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.es:
El  Sr. Jonathan   vive con su madre y a su vez trabaja en una  empresa de taller mecánico  y gracias a su trabajo el puede estudiar.
Ees una persona muy responsable y dedicada a sus estudios y a su familia , aspira a ser una buena profesional y seguir estudiando y servir a las personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus cuotas de carrera en comercio internacional.
texts.en:
Señor Jonathan lives with his mother and at the same time works in a mechanic's shop. Thanks to his work, he can go to school.

He is a very responsible person who is dedicated to his education and to his family. He aspires to be a good professional and continue studying and serving people.

He is requesting this loan to be able to cover his program costs in international business.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear
